text:
Oh.
Yes, Chiyoko, you look great!

If there's anything you're concerned about,
we can make adjustments...

Thank you very much.
By the way, could I check the schedule just in case...?

Of course! Please wait a moment,
I'll bring up the schedule on my phone...!
Well, the rehearsal is scheduled for this day...
(...I have to be careful with my stomach...!)
